title: Marshall's Great Noodles
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small noodle cart in the John Dunn Shops. Most of the menu is vegan, and meat is available as an addition, as is organic tofu. Serves a variety of noodles, soups, dumplings, and sauces, and features local and organic produce. Try the mushroom-filled rice paper dumplings in tomato-coconut broth, and rice noodles with vegetables in red curry sauce. Outdoor seating includes one small table owned by the cart owner, plus lots of other seating in the plaza area of the shops. It's shady with free Wi-Fi in the entire area. A popular stop for locals and tourists alike.
